meanings.definition: Present participle of elaborate: adding more detail or information
meanings.sent1: She is elaborating on her science project to make it more informative.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys elaborating on his favorite topic during class discussions.
meanings.sent3: The cat is elaborating on its plan to catch the mouse, complete with diagrams.
meanings.sent4: The artist is elaborating on the canvas, adding layers of color and texture.
meanings.sent5: The teacher is elaborating on the concept, making it easier for the students to understand.

meanings.definition: Present participle of elaborate: developing or explaining in detail
meanings.sent1: They are elaborating on the new project to ensure everyone understands their roles.
meanings.sent2: The author is elaborating on the character's backstory in the novel.
meanings.sent3: The chef is elaborating on the recipe, adding a pinch of creativity.
meanings.sent4: The architect is elaborating on the design, incorporating elements of nature.
meanings.sent5: The musician is elaborating on the melody, creating a harmonious composition.
